Clean modern sight for tanks with LRF

TO INSTALL IT, extract and place "UserSights" to the War Thunder root folder.

list.description:
#sight #firos_6 #firos #firos6
Better sight for it_fiat_6614_firos
*Add 50 meter and 100 meter scales
*More accurate scale than default
*Delete useless scales above 2000 meters
(when over 2000 meters,the dispersion exceeds will above twice the height of target , shooting is basically a waste of ammunition)
*Small scale=50 meters for convenient and more precise aiming

Note:the dispersion of the rocket is circular,so the default aiming position is middle of the target to ensure maximum coverage area.
If the target is only partially exposed (such as turret), please aim at the corre...
